Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Platinum Residence places you in the heart of Warsaw, minutes from Warsaw Uprising Museum and close to Old Town Square. This 4-star apartment is close to Royal Castle and Lazienki Park.

Rooms
Stay in one of 219 guestrooms featuring LCD televisions. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and blackout drapes/curtains.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including a hair salon and shopping on site. Additional amenities include tour/ticket assistance and discounted use of a nearby fitness facility. Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the area shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
You can find a meal at a coffee shop/café serving guests of Platinum Residence, or stop in at a grocery/convenience store. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include limo/town car service, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. For a surcharge, guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle (available 24 hours) and a train station pick-up service.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
You can find a meal at a coffee shop/café serving guests of Platinum Residence, or stop in at a grocery/convenience store. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including a hair salon and shopping on site. Additional amenities include tour/ticket assistance and discounted use of a nearby fitness facility. Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the area shuttle (surcharge).
Stay in one of 219 guestrooms featuring LCD televisions. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and blackout drapes/curtains.

A stay at Platinum Residence places you in the heart of Warsaw, minutes from Warsaw Uprising Museum and close to Old Town Square. This 4-star apartment is close to Royal Castle and Lazienki Park.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Warsaw Uprising Museum - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Rondo 1 Conference Centre - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Warsaw Ghetto - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Zlote Tarasy - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
ORCO Tower - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
John Paul II Museum - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Saxon Gardens - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Palace of Culture and Science - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Reformed Franciscan Church - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Tomb of Unknown Soldier - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Palace of the Four Winds - 1.9 km / 1.1 mi
Grand Theatre - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Zacheta - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Duckert Palace - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Pilsudski Square - 2 km / 1.2 mi

The preferred airport for Platinum Residence is Warsaw (WAW-Frederic Chopin) - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

RoomType.text: Superior Apartment 1 Double Bed (with extra bed)

Message.Text:
Room 1
From 2016-01-05 To 2030-12-31
Deposit Required Upon Arrival
The hotel requires a credit card as a deposit to cover any incidentals charged to the room. Cash & debit card deposits are not accepted.

From 2016-01-05 To 2030-12-31

The hotel requires a credit card as a deposit to cover any incidentals charged to the room. Cash & debit card deposits are not accepted.

Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: Platinum Residence is a fully non-smoking property. *A 615 PLN fee will be charged to any guest who violates the smoking policy. *For all terms visit: www.platinumresidence.com. Holmes Place is available for guests over 16 years old. Swimming pool is available to children over 4 years old (accompanied by an adult) on Saturday and Sunday between 1 PM and 4 PM only. *Children stay free of charge when occupying the parent or guardians room, using existing bedding.No parties, events or receptions are allowed in the subleased apartment.In case of infringing this ban the credit card will be charged 615 PLN per breach.The latest check-out time is 12:00 PM on the date of departure. *If extension is required, it should be arranged in advance. *25% daily rate applies for late check-out. EXTRA DUVET-EUR10/NIGHT*Access to Holmes Place cost Euro16.50(65 PLN)/person from March 01, 2016 onwards.* Baby Cot - 5.00 Parking costs 25€ (99 PLN) CREDIT CARD IS A MUST FOR DEPOSIT UPON CHECK-IN

Room 1
Check in time: 2 PM; check out time: 12 PM,Below find the extra facilities price list and reservation conditions related to your booking.Additional charges that may appear:* Underground parking: 99 PLN/night - limited capacity, reservation not possible* Breakfast: 59 PLN/person* Internet: 27 PLN/night* Holmes Place Club access: 65 PLN/person/single entrance* Extra bed: 70 PLN/night* Extra bedlinen: 40 PLN/night* A credit card number is required to confirm the booking.* Please note that this booking is not cancelable and non-refundable.* The total price of reservation will be charged at the time of the booking.* In case of no-show or cancellation the whole stay will be charged.* Free cancelation or modification is not possible.* Reception open from 6:30 AM till 10:30 PM. Arrivals after 10:30 PM require notice in 24 hours advance.* Apartments are available from 2:00 PM on the day of arrival.* Arrivals prior to 2:00 PM will be subject to availability or can be guaranteed by pre-registration one day prior to arrival.* Credit card deposits are required at the check-in. Credit cards will be authorized at check-in for the amount of the stay plus incidentals.* For security purposes, you will be asked to provide a valid ID at the check-in.* The latest check-out time is 12:00 PM on the date of departure.* If extension is required, it should be arranged in advance.* 50% daily rate applies for late check-out up to 6:00 PM, 100% daily rate for check-out after 6:00 PM, subject to availability on the day of departure.* Children stay free of charge when occupying the parent or guardian's room, using existing bedding. If extra bed or bed linen are required the surcharges will apply.* Platinum Residence is a fully non-smoking property.* A 615 PLN fee will be charged to any guest who violates the smoking policy.* Holmes Place is available for guests over 16 years old. The swimming pool is available to children over 4 years old (acompanied by an adult) on Saturday and Sunday between 1 PM and 4 PM only.* No parties, events or receptions are allowed in the subleased apartment.In case of infringing this ban the credit card will be charged 615 PLN per breach.* For all terms and conditions please visit: www.platinumresidence.com.Please do not hesitate to contact us at the following e-mail address reservation@platinumresidence.com , we are at your disposal for any further information you need.
Notice
The guests can order a breakfast set at the reception. Breakfast sets are delivered to the apartment's door. Breakfasts are delivered weekly from 6:00 to 7:45 and on weekends from 7:30 to 9:30.


Local Charges: 100.00% deposit per room per night

The swimming pool is available to children over 4 years old (acompanied by an adult) on Saturday and Sunday between 1 PM and 4 PM only.* No parties, events or receptions are allowed in the subleased apartment.In case of infringing this ban the credit card will be charged 615 PLN per breach.* For all terms and conditions please visit: www.platinumresidence.com.Please do not hesitate to contact us at the following e-mail address reservation@platinumresidence.com , we are at your disposal for any further information you need.
Notice
The guests can order a breakfast set at the reception. Breakfast sets are delivered to the apartment's door. Breakfasts are delivered weekly from 6:00 to 7:45 and on weekends from 7:30 to 9:30.


Local Charges: 100.00% deposit per room per night
